title: help
help.description: Show this message, or more details on a specific command.

title: quote
q
quote.description: Quote a message using a message ID, and optionally leave your own reply to a quoted message.

title: quotechannel
quotechan
qchan
qc
quotechannel.description: Quote a message using a message ID from a specific channel.

title: prefix
prefix.description: See currently set prefix, or change to a different prefix for this server.

title: delcommands
delcmds
delcommands.description: Toggle whether to automatically delete the quote command message before quoting.

title: reactions
reactions.description: Toggle whether to let users quote messages by adding :speech_balloon: reaction to them.

title: pinchannel
pinc
pinchannel.description: Set a channel that will be used for pinning messages. Members with Manage Messages permission can react with :pushpin: to pin a message.

title: blacklistadd
blacklistadd.description: Blacklist a user/server with a specified ID with an optional reason.

title: blacklistcheck
blacklistcheck.description: Check if the specified ID is blacklisted.

title: blacklistremove
blacklistremove.description: Remove a specified ID from a blacklist.

title: leave
leave.description: **Owner Only:** Leave the server specified by ID
